storyInfo: Iwona receives assistance from a campaign knight while in the middle of a predicament, but her savior is a bit different from what she expected.

attributes.content: 'Iwona, what do you fight for?'

attributes.text: 'To become a glorious campaign knight, of course. To take on the strong, protect the weak, and make a name for myself!'

attributes.content: Upon hearing Iwona's answer, her parents laughed with satisfaction. Her visiting uncle cheerfully patted her head.
There's just one last Infected to contact on the list? Already?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Of course. You know how quick I work.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Great.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Anybody else you need me to get in touch with? Lemme take care of it.
attributes.name: Iwona
Sona
attributes.content: Let's see...

attributes.name: Sona
attributes.content: Nope, we're good for today.
attributes.joined: Let's see...Nope, we're good for today.

attributes.content: After you contact this Mr. Kalisz, you can take the rest of the afternoon off.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Time off? Naw, I don't need any of that.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Iwona, getting proper rest is important too!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: (Wait, is that... a campaign knight?)
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: A campaign knight stands before a newsstand not too far away, and Iwona naturally comes to a stop when she sees him.
...That'll be...
attributes.name: Newsstand Owner

attributes.content: ...Not this one... Umm...
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Seeing that he's in a bit of a pinch, she quickly strides forward without a second thought.
She wasn't able to personally witness the Silverlance Pegasi entering the city on the night of the power outage, but the flood of news and photos that followed stirred her heart.
For her, it was a bolt from the blue that pierced through Kazimierz's neon skyline.
Sona, something came up. Talk to you later!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: But you're supposed to be taking a break—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I know! After I get ahold of Mr. Kalisz, I'll make sure to do nothing else this afternoon!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Okay, see you!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (Calm down, Iwona. Calm down.)
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Good day. Do you need some help?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: I am—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Up close, Iwona can now clearly see the source of the campaign knight's hesitation – two lottery tickets.
A campaign knight. Gambling.
Two things she'd never imagined could mix.
...I am Iwona Krukowska, an Infected competition knight.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Sorry for bothering you. I'll be on my way now, if there's nothing urgent I can help with.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: One moment, please. Do you know anything about this type of lotto–
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Sorry, I'm not familiar with that stuff... Goodbye.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Alright then.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Why would a dignified campaign knight be buying lotto tickets? Seems kinda sketchy for someone like that.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Well, whatever. None of my business.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Maybe he was just curious because he'd never seen stuff like that. Yeah, that's gotta be it.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Let's see... Mr. Kalisz is supposed to live somewhere around here...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Mr. Kalisz?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I-Iwona...
attributes.name: Kalisz

attributes.content: The man she was looking for is collapsed in his own doorway, moaning as he clutches the wound on his leg, blood gushing between his fingers.
There is nobody nearby to help him. Nor does anyone dare step forward to help the injured Infected, for obvious reasons.
Did the Armorless Union do this?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (Nods in pain)
attributes.name: Kalisz

attributes.content: Where'd they go?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (Points towards the depths of the alley)
attributes.name: Kalisz

attributes.content: Dammit!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Iwona urgently bandages his wound, then tightly grips her lance.
I'm gonna go settle the score–
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: As soon as those words leave her mouth, it suddenly dawns on her – is it really a good idea to leave him alone after he was just attacked? An Infected person, at that.

The old Wild Mane Knight would never have considered this: all she'd ever wanted was to charge at her enemies lance-first. But now, things were different. Now she's Wild Mane of the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub.
But if she let the assassins get away, wouldn't that endanger both herself and Mr. Kalisz?
Right at that moment, she sees someone pass by the entrance to the alley.
Hey– Do you hear me? Hello?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Iwona Kru... Miss Krukowska? Did you need something–
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: This man... Who did this to him?
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: The Armorless Union. I'm about to go teach them a lesson. Can I leave Mr. Kalisz to you?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Sure thing. Wait a sec– is he also Infected, like you?
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: So what if he is?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Then I have to be extra careful not to come in contact with his blood, right?
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Go show those sewage-sucking pests what for! I'll take care of him!
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Appreciate it!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Take him to a Pinus Sylvestris safe house, please! He knows the way!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: This card has our knightclub's crest. Show it to the people there, and they'll know what happened!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Hold it right there!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You've got nowhere to run!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: ...You're pretty quick on your feet, girl.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Why did you attack Mr. Kalisz?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: First, I don't know either.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Second, I know who you are, Wild Mane.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Seems like you got into a pretty big brawl with my colleagues earlier, but that's none of my business.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Also, you ought to get your temper under control, for your own sake. We weren't after that guy's life, yet you've chosen to wade into these murky waters yourself?
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Just shut up and face me, asshole!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I'll admit, I'm no match for you. But you were never one of my targets to begin with.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: You were about to skip town too, so why bring all this extra trouble on yourself?
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: How'd you know we were leaving?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You are public figures, after all.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: A good while ago, I even placed a few bets on you. Lost quite a bit of money on that–
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Who cares?! I'm here because of what you did to Kalisz!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Even if you're just following orders, does your trigger finger not shake even a little bit when you're indiscriminately pointing your weapon at innocents?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Of course my fingers are shaking. I'm absolutely terrified, young lady. So, would you mind letting me go now?
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: I'm not after your head. What I want is—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: An apology!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: For Mr. Kalisz!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: If that's the case, I'm not sure what to tell you.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: All I can say is, you're very fortunate to have met Flametail's crew.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: If you'd all come together, you might have been able to keep your life.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: The Armorless Union member's presence diminishes.
Iwona's instincts, honed through countless battles, tell her that–
Someone's firing arrows?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Where are they hiding? I need to flush them out–
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The arrows from the hidden assassins take aim at her vitals, forcing her to constantly dodge.
Then, she sees the person she had just cornered take out a bow and aim it squarely between her eyes–
Reveal yourselves, you vermin squirming in the shadows!
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: ...The campaign knight?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: We do not defend Kazimierz to provide a breeding ground for your corruption!
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: A campaign knight?
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Iwona, don't let them catch you off-guard.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Monitor any movements in your surroundings. We need to get out of here.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Mmhmm! The campaign knight brought Mr. Kalisz over, and Rhodes Island's Doctor is here too. You're in good hands now!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: After how hard you've been working, you really deserve that afternoon break!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Sorry, but what should I call you?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Marsov will do.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Thank you so much, Sir Marsov. I really mean it!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: No need to be so polite. I just happened to be passing by while on vacation, and decided to lend a hand.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Nobody wants to see Armorless Union filth while on their day off, right?
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Haha, that's for sure!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Speaking of, I happen to have the afternoon off, so why don't we find someplace to have a drink?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Hm, a drink?
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: That's right! I'll foot the bill!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Hmm, I suppose... I can do that.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Alrighty! Time to hit the pubs!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Okay... Gotta say, I was expecting somewhere more crowded. Lively? Why'd you take me to a bar with hardly any people?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I... prefer quieter places.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Hmm, well, I guess that's fine too.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: But man, they've got the good stuff here. Cheers!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Cheers.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: This liquor is quite good.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Marsov, on the night the campaign knights entered Kawalerielki, I was fighting the Armorless Union and didn't get to see you guys in person.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: But I kept up with every bit of news after that! It was the coolest thing ever!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: What Kawalerielki needs is more people like you, unafraid to tear off the masks off those two-faced backstabbers and stomp them into the ground!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You know what those hotshots in the General Chamber think of us Infected knights?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I'm not sure what you're asking. Aren't you just competition knights who happen to have Oripathy?
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Hmph. If normal competition knights are their puppets, we're even less than that. We're nothing but tattered rags to them!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Every time something goes wrong with the competitions, they always find a way to blame some unrelated Infected knight!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: And when they want to brag about how well they treat the Infected, they shove us all on stage to show off the 'preferential treatment' we get... Just thinking about it makes me feel like my lungs are about to burst!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: How could they go and do that?
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Take the Armorless Union. Ever since our Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub got a little famous, they've been knocking at our door nonstop, just because we don't want to get treated like trash by the G.C.C.!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: They nearly killed me on the night of the power outage, and my friends weren't any safer!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I've heard no shortage of rumors about the Armorless Union, but this is the first time I've seen them acting so brazenly in Kawalerielki.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: That's 'cause we're going up against them to help the Infected. They've been trying to get rid of us for a long time.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: But there's no way we're gonna give up. As long as I draw breath, I won't sit back and watch as Kawalerielki chews us up and spits us out!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Hmm... It can't be that bad, can it?
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The Armorless Union and the G.C.C. might be despicable, but we're talking about Kawalerielki as a whole, here. At least the heart of Kazimierz is willing to look after the Infected, right?
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Otherwise, they'd never have agreed to the Infected knights system in the first place.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: The way you put that almost sounds like...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Bah, forget it. I don't wanna think about this. Drink up, drink up!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Pour me another glass, barkeep!
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Want it with ice? Maybe seltzer?
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: Give it to me straight.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Sure thing.
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: Here, one straight whiskey.
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: That's good stuff.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Uhh... lemme get the same thing.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Want to add anything?
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: I also want it straight.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: This stuff's quite powerful undiluted, young lady.
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: I can handle it.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Alright then. Just one moment.
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Phew, that's some good whiskey!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Oh right, Marsov, when I ran into you in the streets, I think you were checking out the lottos?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Lemme give you a word of advice. That stuff is a bottomless pit.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Sona told me before – those tickets are rigged.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You only have any real shot of winning the small prizes. Nobody's ever seen the so-called jackpot before! Oh, and some people bet on the matches too. Those are almost always fixed behind the scenes–
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: That's... That's a load of shit!
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Last month, my cousin... Bought a ticket, and made a ton of money!
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: That's the exception that proves the rule.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I... I also bet on a lot of matches, and I've made some serious dosh!
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: But Sona said the people who give out the tickets have already done the math. You can never make back more money than you spent.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: A complete load of crap!
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: My cousin was real sick, and he only survived 'cause of that prize money!
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: That's just a weird special case–
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The hell are you talkin' about? Sounds like you're asking for a beating!
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Oh right, you said you're an Infected, didn't you?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: ...Got a problem with that?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Infected scum... You should all get thrown out of Kawalerielki, so you stop polluting our streets.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Say that again to my face?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: What, is a filthy Infected gonna start a scene—
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Iwona grabs the drunkard by the collar.
Say that again, I dare you!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Hmph. What're you actin' all smug for...?
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Knights these days are a joke. First, they let the Infected become competition knights; now, even campaign knights are mingling with 'em—
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Marsov, who had been seated the entire time, abruptly stands up.
Sir, I will be holding you responsible for your slander against the campaign knights.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: Whatever.
attributes.name: Drunkard

attributes.content: 'Sir, I will be holding you responsible for your slander against the campaign knights.' Ahh...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: That line was SO badass!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Looks like you're way better at dealing with assholes like that than I am.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Those sorts of people can't tell chalk from cheese. Once they sober up, they'll remember what fear is.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Anyhow, like I was saying before we were rudely interrupted, you'd better not buy those lotto tickets. It's a scam the G.C.C. came up with to squeeze us of our hard-earned money.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I appreciate the advice. I'll try to avoid them.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: That said, they aren't entirely bad.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: What are you talking about? What good could they possibly serve?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: At the very least, they offer a tiny bit of hope to pathetic men like him.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Woah, that's kinda... deep.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Hardly.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Because of that stupid gambling, people've been pushing me to fix my matches ever since I became an Infected knight.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You must have been under a lot of pressure.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Maybe, but I've never caved to 'em even once! Haha!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: If I win, I win. If I lose, I lose. I'm not gonna give up the glory of victory just for a few coins!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Well said. To the glory of victory!
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: To the glory of victory!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Oh right, Iwona. What was your last name again?
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: I seem to vaguely recall hearing of other knights with that name before.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Krukowska.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Actually, some of my family also happen to be campa—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: One second, let me take this call.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Marsov, didn't we agree to meet beneath Mieszko HQ? Where'd you go?
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: I... I had to take care of a little business.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: What kind of business?
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Uhh...
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Stop making shit up. We all saw you walk into a bar with some competition knight-looking chick!
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Never thought you of all people would fall so far.
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: ...That's not true at all!
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: I'm heading over right now–
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Hahaha, don't worry about it. We're already outside the bar!
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Your colleague?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Mm...hmm.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Marsov stands up stiffly and heads out the door.
Against the sunlight, Iwona sees three campaign knights waiting for him to leave.
Playing the long game, are we, Marsov? Cozying up with a competition knight just to steal a drink?
attributes.name: A Campaign Knight A

attributes.content: I did nothing of the sort. Stop joking around like that.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Get out of there. Can't believe you'd slither into this den of commoners. We'll be lucky if you don't get a stomachache from that competition knight liquor.
attributes.name: A Campaign Knight B

attributes.content: Or don't tell me you've fallen in love with her, and plan to—
attributes.name: A Campaign Knight B

attributes.content: Shut up already!
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: C'mon, stop messing with him. He must've had his reasons forcing him to consort with scum like her, the sort that parade around with the title of knight. Isn't that right, Marsov?
attributes.name: A Campaign Knight C

attributes.content: Marsov turns his head and looks at Iwona with embarrassment.
She is still shocked by their remarks, and has no time to respond to his pleading eyes.
He then turns back around.
S-S-Stop making crass jokes like that!
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Oooh, and now he's getting angry.
attributes.name: A Campaign Knight A

attributes.content: Like hell I know who she is. She just grabbed me and forced me to drink with her!
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Who'd cozy up to a girl like that, so infatuated with campaign knights but can't even fit in with them?
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: I wouldn't have been drinking in a shithole like this in the first place if you guys hadn't been late!
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Yeah right! We saw you happily chatting and laughing with her a moment ago.
attributes.name: A Campaign Knight B

attributes.content: I was just being polite. Besides, isn't the whole job of a competition knight to provide entertainment?
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Alright, alright. We can talk about this later.
attributes.name: A Campaign Knight C

attributes.content: Marsov, why?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Ohoh? What's this? A card?
attributes.name: A Campaign Knight A

attributes.content: Haha, never thought an honest-looking guy like you would have such a salacious move in his playbook.
attributes.name: A Campaign Knight A

attributes.content: Is this how the two of you planned to secretly stay in touch? Something like the real letters appear when you hold it over a fire?
attributes.name: A Campaign Knight A

attributes.content: Ridiculous!
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Iwona sees Marsov throw the card bearing the crest of Pinus Sylvestris onto the ground, before viciously grinding his heel on it several times.
I told you I was just having a bit of fun, but you guys won't listen.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: She's an Infected anyway. If she weren't stalking me, I'd never have come to a place like this.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: Urgh, an Infected?
attributes.name: A Campaign Knight A

attributes.content: Tsk, tsk.
attributes.name: A Campaign Knight B

attributes.content: Let's find a place that serves some proper wine. The swill in this shop is so vile that no decent person would be able to swallow it.
attributes.name: Marsov

attributes.content: The campaign knights swagger away noisily.
Iwona remains frozen in place. The only thing she can think to do is to pick up the card from the ground.
Gray boot prints are imprinted on its surface, dense and overlapping.
So this... is a campaign knight?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Iwona thinks back to how he had acted from beginning to end.
Which one was the real Marsov?
He was willing to stand up for the safety of the Infected, and even to drink with an Infected knight he had only just met.
Yet, he also stomped on the card symbolizing her knightclub. He lied that she had stalked him, and belittled the competition knights by saying they were only good for entertainment.
He...
This is for you, girl.
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: An extra-large mug of Żubrówka vodka?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I didn't order this...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: This is the finest liquor I serve. It's on the house.
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: Don't worry too much about that guy. The hotshot knights are all like that.
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: You mean... him?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Who else?
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: Seeing you like this... Forget it, I'll pay for your drinks this time.
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: Why though?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You helped me drive away a mean drunk just now, didn't you? Treat it as fair payment.
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: So enjoy your drink. After all, wasn't this bar opened specifically for people like us?
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: ...Alrighty!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Whew, you downed that whole thing in one go?
attributes.name: Bar Owner

attributes.content: It'd be an insult if I didn't!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: After all, I've earned this afternoon off!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Still not sure how exactly to spend it, but I can't let it go to waste.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: *hic*.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Iwona?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Didn't we agree you'd take the afternoon off? Why are you back so soon?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: (Mutters incomprehensibly)
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Oh, because you're smashed.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Did you hit the bars with that campaign knight?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I see. Go ahead and take a nap then.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Woah, she's already out cold.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: She's always had a high alcohol tolerance, and only lets herself get drunk when she's in a bad mood. I wonder what happened to get her like this?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Hiyah!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: What's wrong, Iwona?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: J-J-J-Justice Knight! Assemble!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Beep beep!
attributes.name: Justice Knight

attributes.content: (Oh, she was just sleeptalking...)
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The other day... I... wanted to paint you... sterling silver!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Beep?
attributes.name: Justice Knight

attributes.content: And then, ch-ch-change your name... to Silverlance Pegasus, Justice and Campaign Knight!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Beep-beep-beep?!
attributes.name: Justice Knight

attributes.content: But I changed my mind! From now on... you'll just be Justice Knight, okay? No need to paint, no need for brushes!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Beep...
attributes.name: Justice Knight

attributes.content: Dismissed!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Beep beep.
attributes.name: Justice Knight

attributes.content: A small card falls out of Iwona's pocket, bearing the crest of the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub along with a tessellation of boot prints.
As Sona comes to cover her with a blanket, the card does not escape her eyes.
When she connects the unfamiliar boot prints on the card to the contents of Iwona's sleeptalking, she has a rough idea of how she got drunk like this.
'What do I fight for?'
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (whispers) Iwona?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I want...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: to become a glorious...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Phew, that's some good whiskey!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Zzz... zzz...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Iwona turns over, stops talking in her sleep, and falls into a deep slumber.
Sona sighs, puts away the besmirched card, and slides a fresh, clean one into Iwona's pocket.
